title: What is the policy for political signs in New Hanover County? The road sides are littered with them and who is responsible for the enforcement of them??
text:
I believe this previous post at MyReporter.com will answer part of
your question: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7648



In New Hanover County, political signs are regulated by the zoning
office in the planning department:
http://www.nhcgov.com/planningandinspections/Pages/Code%20Enforcement.aspx
